00015 class ConfStat_t : public StatObj_t
00016 {
00017 public:
00018   ConfStat_t() : _n(0), _feBad(0),_consecutiveWrites(0),_nTotal(0), _feBadTotal(0),_consecutiveWritesTotal(0) {};
00019 
00022   void finish() {unCheckedCheckPoint();};
00023 
00026   void printTableHeader(std::ostream &out) const ;
00027 
00029   void print(std::ostream &out) ;
00030 
00032   bool hasInfo() const {return error();};
00033 
00035   void addGood() { checkPoint(); _n++;};
00036 
00038   void addBad()  { checkPoint(); _n++; _feBad++;};
00039 
00041   void addConsecutiveWrites() { checkPoint(); _n++;_consecutiveWrites++;};
00042   
00045   void checkPoint() {
00046     if (_n > 10) {
00047       unCheckedCheckPoint();
00048     }
00049   }
00050 
00053   void unCheckedCheckPoint() {
00054       _nTotal+=_n;
00055       _feBadTotal+=_feBad;
00056       _consecutiveWritesTotal+=_consecutiveWrites;
00057       _n=0;
00058       _feBad=0;
00059       _consecutiveWrites=0;;
00060   };
00061   
00064   unsigned int n() const {return _n;};
00065 
00068   unsigned int bad() const {return _feBad;};
00069 
00072   unsigned int consecutiveWrites() const {return _consecutiveWrites;};
00073 
00076   unsigned int error() const {return _feBadTotal+_consecutiveWritesTotal;};
00077   
00080   unsigned int nTotal() const {return _nTotal;};
00081 
00084   unsigned int badTotal() const {return _feBadTotal;};
00085 
00088   unsigned int consecutiveWritesTotal() const {return _consecutiveWritesTotal;};
00089   
00090 private:
00091   unsigned int _n;
00092   unsigned int _feBad;
00093   unsigned int _consecutiveWrites;
00094   
00095   unsigned int _nTotal;
00096   unsigned int _feBadTotal;
00097   unsigned int _consecutiveWritesTotal;
00098 };
